search complet team history, see histori washington redskins. rfk stadium home redskin 1961 1996. list season complet washington redskin american footbal franchis nation footbal leagu (nfl). list document season-by-season record redskins' franchis 1932 present, includ postseason records, leagu award individu player head coaches. redskin franchis found boston braves, name local basebal franchise.[1] team chang name redskin 1933 move washington, d.c. 1937.[2] redskin play 1,000 games. games, club five profession american footbal championship includ two nfl championship three super bowls. franchis captur ten nfl division titl six nfl confer championships.[3] redskin 1937 1942 championship games, well super bowl xvii, xxii, xxvi. also play lost 1936, 1940, 1943, 1945 championship games, well super bowl vii xviii. made 22 postseason appearances, overal postseason record 23 win 17 losses. five team appear super bowl redskins: dalla cowboy (eight), pittsburgh steeler (eight), denver bronco (seven), new england patriot (seven), san francisco 49er (six); redskins' five appear tie oakland raiders, miami dolphins, new york giant green bay packers.[4] redskins' leagu titl attain two ten-year spans. 1936 1945, redskin went nfl championship six times, win two them.[5] second period last 1982 1991 redskin appear postseason seven times, captur four confer titles, three super bowl four appearances.[5] redskin also experienc failur history. notabl period failur 1946 1970, redskin singl postseason appearance.[6] period, redskin went without singl win season 1956 1968.[6] 1961 season, franchis post worst regular season record 1–12–1 showing.[6] seasons[edit] note: finish, wins, losses, tie column list regular season result exclud postseason play. italic number mean record subject chang week due regular season postseason game played. nfl champion (1920–1969) super bowl champion (1970–present) confer champion divis champion wild card berth offici nfl record end 2015 nfl season. season team leagu confer divis regular season postseason result award finish win loss tie boston brave 1932 1932 nfl 4th 4 4 2 — boston redskin 1933 1933 nfl east 3rd 5 5 2 — 1934 championship (2) (bears) 14–6 1943 1943 nfl east 1st 6 3 1 eastern division playoff (giants) 28–0 lost nfl championship (bears) 41–21 1944 1944 nfl east 3rd 6 3 1 — 1945 1945 nfl east 1st 8 2 0 lost — 1967[9] 1967 nfl eastern capitol 3rd 5 6 3 — 1968 1968 nfl eastern capitol 3rd 5 9 0 — 1969 1969 nfl eastern capitol 2nd 7 5 2 — 1970 1970 nfl nfc east 4th 6 8 0 — 1971 1971 nfl nfc east 2nd 9 4 1 lost division playoff (49ers) 24–20 georg allen (coy) 1972 1972 nfl nfc east 1st 11 3 0 division playoff (packers) 16–3 confer championship (cowboys) 26–3 lost super bowl vii (dolphins) 14–7 larri brown (mvp, opoy) 1973 1973 nfl nfc east 2nd[10] 10 4 0 lost division playoff (vikings) 27–20 1974 1974 nfl nfc east 2nd 10 4 0 lost division playoff (lo angel rams) 19–10 1975 1975 nfl nfc east 3rd 8 6 0 — mike thoma (oroy) 1976 1976 nfl nfc east 2nd[11] 10 4 0 lost division playoff (vikings) 35–20 1977 1977 nfl nfc east 2nd[12] 9 5 0 — 1978[13] 1978 nfl nfc east 3rd 8 8 0 — john riggin (cbpoy) 1979 1979 nfl nfc east 3rd[14] 10 6 0 — jack parde (coy) 1980 1980 nfl nfc east 3rd 6 10 0 — 1981 1981 nfl nfc east 4th 8 8 0 — 1982[15] 1982 nfl nfc 1st 8 1 0 first round (lions) 31–7 second round 17–0 1987[17] 1987 nfl nfc east 1st 11 4 0 division playoff (bears) 21–17 confer championship (vikings) 17–10 super bowl xxii (4) (broncos) 42–10 doug william (sb mvp) 1988 1988 nfl nfc east 3rd 7 9 0 24–7 confer championship (lions) 41–10 super bowl xxvi (5) (bills) 37–24 joe gibb (coy) mark rypien (sb mvp)[18] 1992 1992 nfl nfc east 3rd[19] 9 7 0 wild card playoff (vikings) 24–7 lost division playoff (49ers) 20–13 1993 1993 nfl nfc east 5th 4 12 0 — 1994 1994 nfl nfc east 5th 3 13 0 — 1995 1995 nfl nfc east 3rd 6 10 0 — 1996 1996[20] nfl nfc east 3rd[21] 9 7 0 — darrel green (wpmoy)[22] ^ last year redskin play griffith stadium. ^ first year redskin play d.c. stadium (rfk). ^ 1967 nfl season mark first season league' histori leagu divid two confer subdivid two divisions. 1967, leagu either divid two divisions, two conferences, neither. ^ end 1973 season, redskin cowboy finish season ident 10–4 records. use nfl' tie-break procedures, dalla finish ahead washington nfc east base better point differenti head-to-head games. ^ end 1976 season, redskin st. loui cardin end season ident 10–4 records. use nfl' tie-break procedures, washington finish ahead st. loui base head-to-head sweep. ^ end 1977 season, redskin bear finish season ident 9–5 records. use nfl' tie-break procedures, chicago finish ahead washington base better net point confer games. ^ 1978 season, nfl expand 14-game season 16-game season. ^ end 1979 season, redskin bear finish season ident 10–6 records. use nfl' tie-break procedures, chicago finish ahead washington base better net point games. ^ 1982 nfl season shorten 16 game per team 9 game players' strike. nfl adopt special 16-team playoff tournament; eight team confer seed 1–8, divis stand ignored. ^ end 1985 season, redskins, cowboys, giant finish season ident 10–6 records. use nfl' tie-break procedures, dalla finish ahead new york washington base better head-to-head record. new york finish ahead washington san francisco wild-card race base better confer record. ^ 1987 nfl season shorten 16 game per team 15 game players' strike. game play third week season canceled, replac player use play game week 4 6. ^ "super bowl xxvi mvp". year redskin play rfk stadium. ^ end 1996 season, redskin vike finish season ident 9–7 records. use nfl' tie-break procedures, minnesota finish ahead washington base better confer record. ^ george,
